sen.j: 京都平野（みやこへいや）とは、主に福岡県行橋市の中心部から京都郡東部・築上郡北部に広がる平野を指す。
sen.e: Miyako Plain refers to a plan that spreads from the center of Yukuhashi City, Fukuoka Prefecture to the eastern part of Miyako-gun (Miyako County) and the northern part of Chikujo-gun(Chikujo County).
Miyako Plain refers to a plain that spreads from the center of Yukuhashi City, Fukuoka Prefecture to the eastern part of Miyako-gun County and the northern part of Chikujo-gun County.
Miyako Plain refers to a plain that spreads from the center of Yukuhashi City, Fukuoka Prefecture to the eastern part of Miyako County and the northern part of Chikujo County.
It is also called Buzen Plain.
It is also called Buzen Plain.
It is also called Buzen Plain.

sen.j: 明確に範囲を定義することは出来ないが、カルスト台地で有名な平尾台の南東に位置し、行橋市、みやこ町、築上町北部にかけて広がる平野である。
sen.e: Although its definite scope cannot be defined, this plain lies southeast to Hiraodai Plateau, famous for its karst plateau, and spreads over Yukuhashi City, Miyako-machi, and the northern part of Chikujo-machi.

Although its definite scope cannot be defined, this plain lies southeast to Hiraodai Plateau, famous for its karst plateau, and spreads over Yukuhashi City, Miyako Town, and the northern part of Chikujo Town.

Although its definite scope cannot be defined, this plain lies southeast to Hiraodai Plateau, famous for its karst plateau, and spreads over Yukuhashi City, Miyako Town, and the northern part of Chikujo Town.

sen.j: 河川によって運ばれた堆積物によって形成された典型的な平野である。
sen.e: It is a typical plain made up of sediment carried by rivers.
It is a typical plain made up of sediment carried by rivers.
It is a typical plain made up of sediment carried by rivers.

sen.j: 行橋市南西部、みやこ町、築上町北部は田園地帯であり、農業が盛んである。
sen.e: The southwest part of Yukuhashi City, Miyakomachi and the northern part of Chikujo-machi are all rural areas, where agriculture is the main industry.
The southwest part of Yukuhashi City, Miyako Town and the northern part of Chikujo Town are all rural areas, where agriculture is the main industry.
The southwest part of Yukuhashi City, Miyako Town and the northern part of Chikujo Town are all rural areas, where agriculture is the main industry.

sen.j: 今川、長峡川、祓川下流部には行橋市市街地を成し、城井川河口部には築上町の市街地を成す。
sen.e: Ima-gawa River, Nagao-gawa River, and the lower part of Harai-gawa River constitute of the urban area of Yukuhashi City, and the urban area of Chikujo-mach is located at the mouth of Kii-kawa River.

The Ima-gawa River, the Nagao-gawa River, and the lower part of the Harai-gawa River constitute of the urban area of Yukuhashi City, and the urban area of Chikujo Town is located at the mouth of the Kii-kawa River.

The Ima-gawa River, the Nagao-gawa River, and the lower part of the Harai-gawa River constitute of the urban area of Yukuhashi City, and the urban area of Chikujo Town is located at the mouth of the Kii-kawa River.

sen.cmt: 小波瀬川の読み方が不明です。
